class Client[source]

Client(endpoint:str, client_id, client_secret, scope)

simple client to run queries and processes using the Board APIs. See related documentation when creating External Queries in a Board Datamodel

The Client Object takes 4 Parameters:

  • endpoint(String) : URL of the Board Host
  • client_id(String) : The client ID
  • client_secret(String) : The Secret
  • scope(String) : The API Scope
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

query[source]

query(datamodel:str, query_name:str, query_string=str)

Execute a datamodel external query and returns a python dictionary with the data from Board.

The Function takes 3 Parameters:

  • datamodel(String) : Name of the Board Database
  • query_name(String) : Name of the Query
  • query_string(String) : Query in String Format
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

cubes[source]

cubes(datamodel:str)

Return list of cubes for specified datamodel.

The Function takes 1 Parameter:

  • datamodel(String) : Name of the Board Database
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

entities[source]

entities(datamodel:str)

Return list of entities for specified datamodel.

The Function takes 1 Parameter:

  • datamodel(String) : Name of the Board Database
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

entity[source]

entity(datamodel:str, entity:str)

Return entity members for specified entity.

The Function takes 2 Parameters:

  • datamodel(String) : Name of the Board Database
  • entity(String) : Name of the specified entity
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

procedure_run[source]

procedure_run(datamodel:str, procedure:str)

Execute a Board Procedure and returns Session ID of the execution.

The Function takes 2 Parameters:

  • datamodel(String) : Name of the Board Database
  • procedure(String) : Board Procedure
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

procedure_status[source]

procedure_status(datamodel:str, session:str)

Return status of the execution of a Board Procedure

The Function takes 2 Parameters:

  • datamodel(String) : Name of the Board Database
  • session(String) : Session
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
